Utilitarian in style, it has a slim fit with an internal belt offering a feminine silhouette. It's a zip-through design with storm flap detail, a bungee-adjustable hood treated to a contrast logo and it's finished with front zip pockets.

Details include an embroidered contrast colour logo, zip side pockets, a patch back pocket and a drawcord elasticated waist for a great fit.

They have an elasticated waist, signature double logo detail in a contrasting colour and offer a flattering fit and smooth silhouette.

products.title: V-Neck Fit and Flare Dress in Poppies Print
products.body_html: The V-Neck Fit and Flare Dress in a beautifully abstract poppy print is a key statement piece from the Autumn Winter 2022 collection. The large oversized florals lend a dramatic yet romantic and glamorous touch, while the crisp ivory contrast keeps things relaxed and undone. Pair with our signature heels for the completed look.

products.title: Single Button Jacket in Dusty Rose
products.body_html: The Single Button Jacket is a brand signature, thanks to its versatile, classic fit. Made from a wool tailoring fabrication, and completed with patch pockets, and subtle pleating details. Wear it with the corresponding trouser for a head-to-toe, tailored look.

products.title: Ella Jean in Sky-Blue Wash
products.body_html: Autumn Winter 2022 sees the debut of the Ella Jean in Sky-Blue Wash, a wide-leg style yet a structured fit, mid rise and lower slung waist. Made in Italy from a structured denim fabrication, they're meant to be worn long, with a leather branding patch at the waist and a branded shank and rivets to finish the look.

products.title: Panelled Shirt in Black
products.body_html: Made from 100% silk for a luxurious handle, this Panelled Shirt in Black pairs perfectly with key tailoring looks or can be used to add an elegance to high-waisted denim. Finished with sheer panel detailing; It is a key style in this season's 'formal library', which includes shirting for a range of occasions and moods.

products.title: Tailored Tracksuit Trouser in Dark Navy
products.body_html: With it's slim fitting silhouette, contrasting chevron panel detailing and popper buttons The Tailored Tracksuit Trouser in Dark Navy it is the perfect nod to the 90s era. Yet the structured detailing and intricate tailoring give the signature VB tailoring aesthetic. Pair with the corresponding top for the completed look.

products.title: Long Sleeve Cami Dress in Black
products.body_html: With its contrasting fabrications of sheer woven panelling and dazzling sequins, this Long Sleeve Cami Dress in Black is an unforgettable piece from the Autumn Winter 2022 collection. All-over bodice statement sequins lend a dramatic, glamorous touch, while the delicate spaghetti straps, and long mesh sleeves give a casual elegance. The straight cut waistline and solid black skirt panel give a sense of drama and ultilitarian flare. Pair with our signature heels for an added dimension to your look.

products.title: Anorak Mini Dress in Khaki
products.body_html: The mood for Autumn Winter 2022 is utility meets tailoring, and this Anorak Mini Dress in Khaki channels this perfectly. With its structured yet relaxed fit, zip front fastening, and lightweight fabrication, it's an easy piece for work, weekend, day or night. Stitched pleats at the waist lend a subtle finishing touch, combined with a formal collar and patch pockets.

products.title: Chevron Tracksuit Dress in Dark Navy
products.body_html: The Chevron Tracksuit Dress in Dark Navy pays homage to the 90s the VB way. With its elegant and longline silhouette, this finely knitted dress drapes perfectly on the bodice; whilst enhancing the shape with contrasting chevron panel details. It is complete with a zip back finish. Pair with our signature heels for the completed look.

products.title: Utility Shirt Dress in Bright Green
products.body_html: This Utility Shirt Dress in Bright Green embodies Autumn Winter 2022 collection's utilitarian edge, with its straight-cut hemline, frontal patch pockets, and monochromatic belt to finish the look . Made from a wool tailoring fabrication, the piece is finished with a contrasting button-down front, and a subtle pleating details that offer a sense of structure.

products.title: Polo Neck Top in Pink
products.body_html: Sheer fabrications and layered looks are key this Autumn winter 2022. This lightweight poloneck is designed with an intricate woven fabrication, using this season's iconic dusty pink. Pair with VB's signature tailoring, or layer with our floral slip dresses.

products.title: Polo Neck Top in Black
products.body_html: Sheer fabrications and layered looks are key this Autumn winter 2022. This lightweight poloneck is designed with an intricate woven fabrication, using this season's signature black. Pair with VB's signature tailoring, or layer with our sequin cami.

products.title: Reebok X VB Graphic Sweatshirt in Fresh Blue
products.body_html: With a nod to vintage sportswear, the Reebok x VB Graphic Sweatshirt has a fun, retro feel. Made from a super-soft French terry cotton in fresh blue, it has ribbed cotton inserts and double logo detail in contrasting orange. Consciously crafted, the cotton used is 50% Better Cotton sourced entirely through sustainable farming. A classic crew neck sweatshirt with a slim fit, pull it on when you're ready to workout and go.

products.title: Reebok X VB Runner Sneaker in Solar Orange
products.body_html: The Reebok x VB Runner Sneaker in a saturated orange hue, draws inspiration from the Reebok London, a running shoe from 1984. The vintage style of the upper is off-set by innovative details, creating a sneaker that transcends decades. It's crafted from a breathable engineered mesh upper with exposed foam layers, and has a logo embossed tongue and hidden laces. Inside, it's textile-lined with light and responsive Floatride Fuel cushioining, making the sneaker incredibly comfortable for runs and everyday wear.

products.title: Reebok X VB Runner Sneaker in Fresh Blue
products.body_html: Based on the 1984 Reebok London, the Runner Sneaker is a signature style in the Reebok x VB collection. Although it's modernised by innovative details, the sneaker still has vintage appeal. Striking the balance between casual and elevated wear, it's made from a breathable engineered mesh upper in fresh blue with exposed foam layers, a hidden lace system and a logo embossed tongue. A textile-lined sneaker with light and responsive Floatride Fuel cushioining, it's designed for running, but effortlessly works as an everyday style too.

A flattering shape and a perennial sportswear accessory, it's a style you'll reach for over and over again.

A classic zip-through style, it has a slim fit with a tall, stand-up collar, front zip pockets and signature logo detail in contrast embroidery.

Designed to wear to the gym, also zip it up during off-duty moments.

products.title: Crew Neck Bodysuit in Black
products.body_html: Made from finely knitted Merino Wool-blend, this crewneck Bodysuit is a versatile, form-fitting piece that works well on its own with a skirt, denim or as a layering piece with classic VB tailoring. It is complete with a dual front and back V-shaped sheer panel, allowing an ultra flattering silhouette.

products.title: Deep V-Neck Jumper in Green
products.body_html: With its long sleeves, Deep V-neckline, ribbed trims and cuffs, this jumper is a classic piece for your casual wardrobe. Crafted from a super soft mohair blend, the bright emerald shade is complemented by a tonal VB monogram at the left hem. Pair with our signature VB denim for the complete look.

products.title: Frame Bucket Bag In Burgundy Leather
products.body_html: In timeless deep burgundy leather, the Frame Bucket Bag offers an elevated style that’s expertly equipped for everyday use. Featuring a deep, spacious interior with a hidden inner pouch, it’s constructed with a detachable double strap to be worn as a shoulder bag or carried. The gold-tone hardware mirrors the clean, structural lines with the top frame opening into a graphic diamond shape in one fluid movement.

products.title: Chain Pouch Bag In Off-White Leather
products.body_html: The hardware on the Chain Pouch bag takes its lead from the jewellery in the Spring Summer 2022 collection, originally inspired by a vintage watch strap from Victoria’s personal collection. Crafted in Italy from fine leather in off-white, a contrast burgundy edging is among the style’s considered details, while the soft, folded structure lends a tactile quality. Nestle it under the crook of your arm or slip your wrist through the chain strap for an innovative way to style.

products.title: Small Half Moon Bag In House Monogram Jacquard
products.body_html: For a low-key way to embrace logos, our VB House Monogram is inspired by heritage jacquards from the 60s and 70s. It plays a starring role on the Small Half Moon bag, together with navy leather and gold-tone hardware in an elegant combination that’s designed to go with everything. The wide top handle features a buckle detail taken from our classic ready-to-wear belts, while the top zip fastening is finished with a navy leather tassel.

products.title: Chain Pouch In Green Leather
products.body_html: Apple green is a signature shade for VB’s new season collection and adds a juicy colour pop to the Chain Pouch bag. Softly structured with an envelope shape, it’s secured by chain link hardware originally inspired by one of Victoria’s vintage watch straps. It’s designed to sit snugly under the arm, thanks to its generous size and soft, folded structure, or slip your wrist through the strap for an unexpected styling hack.

products.title: Chain Pouch Bag In Black Leather
products.body_html: With its generous size, envelope design and soft structure, the Chain Pouch bag is a tactile style. In classic black, the gold-tone hardware makes for a striking detail, drawing inspiration from masculine watch straps and referencing the jewellery seen in VB’s Spring Summer 2022 collection. The front flap folds neatly into the strap, which also doubles a wristlet for versatility.

products.title: Mini Bucket Bag In Cognac Leather
products.body_html: From workwear to weekend, the Mini Bucket bag is a smart choice. Crafted in Italy from fine leather in a rich cognac hue, it features a spacious interior that belies its diminutive size and contains a generous interior pouch built into the soft suede lining. The gold-tone magnetic clasp opens wide and closes securely for functional wear, while the shoulder strap can be adjusted to length.

products.title: Chain Pouch In Lilac Leather
products.body_html: In a striking lilac hue, this Chain Pouch bag offers an elevated way to add a pop of colour to your look. A masculine watch-inspired chain front is multifunctional, serving as both a fastening for the envelope opening and as a wrist strap for a secure hold. Contrast edging nods to its considered construction. It’s generous size and soft structure makes it ideal for cuddling close to your body.

products.title: Chain Pouch In Burgundy Leather
products.body_html: Generously oversized and softly structured, the Chain Pouch bag is designed to be hugged close to the body. Its folded envelope opening tucks neatly into the watch strap-inspired chain, which doubles as a wrist strap for versatile styling options. Made in Italy from the finest leather, this burgundy option offers timeless appeal.

products.title: Mini Bucket Bag In Petrol Leather
products.body_html: The Mini Bucket bag has practicality in spades. The central compartment is spacious enough to house all the essentials and features a generous interior pocket set into the soft suede lining. The top opens wide for ease of use and is secured with a minimalist gold-tone clasp, while the shoulder strap can be adjusted for crossbody wear. Made from Italy from the finest leather, it’s seen here in a striking petrol shade, developed exclusively for us.

products.title: Mini Bucket Bag In Burgundy Leather
products.body_html: Combining functional thinking with refined materials, the Mini Bucket bag offers effortless versatility. Timeless burgundy leather is complemented with gold-tone hardware for a modern approach to a neutral aesthetic. The open interior structure maximises capacity, along with a pocket built into the soft suede lining to keep your essentials within easy reach. It’s finished with a magnetic clasp which closes securely and a shoulder strap which can be adjusted to length.

Gold-tone hardware and navy leather complement the colour palette. It’s finished with a neat rectangular clasp and a shoulder strap which can be adjusted to length for crossbody wear.

It’s spacious enough to accommodate life’s essentials and comes with two detachable shoulder straps for added functionality. The graphic top frames open via a rectangular clasp in one fluid movement.

products.title: VB Gift Card
products.body_html:
Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with a Victoria Beckham gift card.

Gift cards are delivered by email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.

products.title: V-Neck Midi Dress in Apple Green
products.body_html: Acid brights such as the Apple Green hue of this V-Neck Midi Dress punctuate the more muted palette of the Pre Autumn Winter 2022 collection. This season's new take on the slip dress, this cady drape version is made in the United Kingdom and has a frill detail and split at the centre back, as well as a hard press detail on the skirt for a touch of structure.

products.title: Cocoon Wrap Coat in Seafoam
products.body_html: A cool, crisp and fresh colour palette is a key feature of our Autumn Winter 2022 collection. This soft, cocoon coat in a seafoam green, offers a touch of crisp tailoring with a delicate element of oversized comfort. The relaxed fit allows for layering underneath, and the frayed edge provides a softened texture. Complete with a pleated back panel, pointed collar and oversized patch pockets.

products.title: Ruched-neck Blouse in Apple Green
products.body_html: The Pre Autumn Winter 2022 collection features a slightly more muted palette that's punctuated by acid brights such as the apple green of this Ruched-neck Blouse. Made in Portugal from a crepe de chine with a soft finish, it is a romantic piece – an update on VB's signature tailoring. An oversized fit is contrasted by a feminine tie-neck detail, ruched back collar and cuffed button fastening, while front box pleats and gathered pleats on the back panel lend a touch of structure.

products.title: 90s Straight Leg Trouser in Dusty Rose
products.body_html: These trousers have a straight-leg silhouette, high rise and pressed crease on the front and back that lend a smart, tailored look. They're crafted from a Wool Gabardine fabrication, with front side pockets and back jetted pockets keep the silhouette clean. Team them with the matching blazer for a head-to-toe look, or opt for one of the season's 90s-inspired blouses.

products.title: 90s Straight Leg Trouser in Bright Green
products.body_html: The 90s were a key inspiration for the Autumn Winter 2022 collection, and these Slim Straight Leg Trousers channel the decade thanks to their straight leg silhouette, and vibrant hue. Made from 100% Wool Gabardine, wear them with a sheer poloneck top or relaxed cotton poplin shirt for an easy, polished look.

products.title: Embroidered Polo Neck Top in Black-Bright Green
products.body_html:
Sheer knits, layering and embroidered detailing are all key elements of the Autumn winter 2022 collection. This lightweight woven poloneck is designed with an intricate and contrasting embroidered design, using this season's iconic emerald green. Pair with VB's signature tailoring, and gold toned jewellery for the completed look.

Customer Note: This product is sold with an emerald green cami slip, complete in a crepe de chine fabrication.

products.title: Tailored Bomber Jacket in Dark Brown-Yellow
products.body_html: A jacket designed to give a playful element of casual elegance too tailoring. This piece has been expertly woven from a tri-toned contrasting boucle fabrication. Sharp pleats give it dynamic movement, whilst the zip front and ribbed detailing provide a modern twist.

products.title: T-Shirt Fitted Dress in Black
products.body_html: This season's take on the Fitted T-Shirt Dress opts for chevron style contrasts on the shoulder panels of this classic style, giving a sophisticated take on sports-luxe. Its high neck and midi hemline create an elongated silhouette, and it's made from a matte, bonded crepe fabric for a narrow, flattering fit. Finish with the classic VB Pump or strappy sandal for a timeless, elegant look.

products.title: Pointed Collar Shirt in Poppies Print
products.body_html: This classic men's shirt has an oversized fit and a single placket frontal button-down fastening, as well as deep cuffs and a slightly curved hemline. A back yoke with a box pleat and hard-pressed creases on the sleeves offer a classic finish, combined with VB's new vibrant poppy print for Autumn winter 2022 . Team it with everything from denim and colour-pop tailoring to fluid skirts.

products.title: T-Shirt Fitted Dress in Bright Green
products.body_html: A classic VB silhouette updated in a vibrant emerald green for our Autumn winter 2022 collection; this dress reimagines one of the brand's original, iconic shapes in a fresh, modern way. Inspired by the simplicity of a T-shirt, it features a narrow fit, modest, high neckline and midi length for a flattering, elongated silhouette.

products.title: Julia High Waisted Straight Leg Jean in Off-White
products.body_html: The Julia Jean in the Off-White Wash is a crisp colourway for Autumn Winter 2022. It has a straight, elongated leg fit with a high waisted rise, a sophisticated silhouette that pairs well with T-shirts, blouses and blazers. Finished with a branded leather patch on the right back waist.

products.title: Julia High Waisted Straight Leg Jean in Haze Wash
products.body_html: The Julia Jean in the Vintage Haze Wash is an essential cut for Autumn Winter 2022. It has a straight, elongated leg fit with a high waisted rise, an easy yet elegant silhouette that pairs well with T-shirts, blouses and blazers. Finished with a branded leather patch on the right back waist.

products.title: Sequin Cami Top in Gold
products.body_html: With its contrasting bralette top and mixed metallic hues, this cami top is an unforgettable piece from the Autumn Winter 2022 collection. All-over statement sequins lend a dramatic, glamorous touch, while the delicate spaghetti straps give a casual elegance. Pair with our signature tailoring, and layer with a sheer poloneck top for added dimension to your look.

products.title: Long Sleeve Slash Front Top in Poppies Print
products.body_html: The vibrant colour-popping, yet crisp Poppy Print is a key motif this Autumn Winter 2022, and can be mixed and matched with our signature VB denim or tailoring. Here, it appears on this beautifully fluid blouse, which also features an elegant neck band, dual deep-cut neckline, and hard-pressed creases on the sleeves finished with structured buttoned cuffs.

products.title: Patch Pocket Shirt in Green-Mustard
products.body_html: Stripes are a signature Victoria Beckham motif, and this season, they come in an olive green and white mustard combination that speaks to the collection's menswear-inspired feel. It's seen here on this organic cotton Patch Pocket Shirt, which has a boxy fit and pocket at the chest, accented with the signature VB monogram embroidered directly underneath. Wear it unbuttoned and tucked into soft tailoring to complete the easy, uncomplicated look.

products.title: Twist Collar Shirt in White-Purple
products.body_html: Stripes are a staple in every VB collection; woven in purple and white from organic cotton, and featuring a twisted collar design for a more casual feel. A relaxed fit through the body and a vertical hard press on the sleeve nod to the season's unexpected contrasts. Pair with signature VB denim to complete the look.

products.title: Patch Pocket Shirt in White
products.body_html: This classic patch pocket shirt looks effortless worn half tucked in and with several of the top buttons left undone. It's made from a classic Cotton Poplin with an all over crisp white colour way, and has a slightly fitted silhouette with a chest patch pocket and subtly curved hemline. Pair with VB Denim for the completed look.

products.title: Panelled Midi Dress in Bright Purple
products.body_html: Bringing back Jewel-tones this season, this Twist Shoulder Fit and Flare, panelled Dress in a deep purple is the perfect example. It features an elongated V-neckline and twisted, knotted straps that nod to the Autumn Winter 2022 collection's utilitarian feel, while the panel seam details, fluid satin fabrication and side seam pockets offer a sense of evening elegance.

products.title: Bralette Cami Dress in Poppies Print
products.body_html: With its panelled bralette, and romantic abstract poppy print, this cami dress is a statement piece from the Autumn Winter 2022 collection. The large oversized florals lend a dramatic, glamorous touch, while the crisp ivory contrast keeps things relaxed and undone.

products.title: Crew Neck Wrap Top in Sky Blue
products.body_html: A finely knitted crew neck jumper, made with a soft touch Merino Wool. This statement piece has an updated look and feel for Autumn Winter 2022; with its attached woollen panels it is designed to be wrapped around the bodice, creating a delicate yet powerful structure. Perfectly paired with denim or our tailoring pieces.

products.body_html: The camisole and slip dress were staples in the 90s, one of Victoria's favourite decades. Made from fluid, crepe back satin, it features a deep V and strap detail on the back that adds to its open, light feeling. In classic black, it's an effortless piece for any occasion.

products.body_html: The camisole and slip dress were staples in the 90s, one of Victoria's favourite decades. This Floor Length Cami Dress combines both and has a deep V and strap detail on the back that adds to its open, light feeling. With its classic fit and standout emerald green hue, it's an effortless yet unforgettable piece.

products.body_html: Whether for autumn or for the festive season, this V-Neck Jumper in Lime Fairisle is a flattering piece, a contemporary take on a classic. With lurex detailing and a slightly cropped, V-neck silhouette, it's an ideal piece to wear with both denim and tailoring alike.

products.title: Utility Shirt Dress in Khaki Green
products.body_html: This Utility Shirt Dress in Khaki Green evokes the Pre Autumn Winter 2022 collection's utilitarian edge, with its double curved hemline, non-functioning front pockets, and belt with silver hardware and sliders. Made from a wool tailoring fabrication, the piece is finished with a hard pressed crease down the side front, side back and outer sleeve, and a hidden button placket that offers a sense of structure.

products.title: Utility Shirt Dress in Black
products.body_html: Made from a Wool Gabardine Fabrication, this Utility Shirt Dress in Black nods to the Pre Autumn Winter 2022 collection's utilitarian edge. It features a double curved hemline, non-functioning front pockets, and a belt with silver hardware and sliders and is finished with a hard pressed crease down the side front, side back and outer sleeve, and a hidden button placket that offers a sense of structure.

products.title: Three Button Single-Breasted Jacket in Black
products.body_html: With its slim fit and high break point, this Three Button Single-Breasted Jacket in Black offers a fresh take in tailoring this Pre Autumn Winter 2022. Made from a crosshatch tailoring fabrication, it features a hard press on the sleeve, three-button closure, and buttonless cuffs for a contemporary feel. A centre back vent and slim fit nod to the season's more structured, utilitarian feel.

products.title: Tailored Shorts in Khaki Green
products.body_html: Utilitarian, uniform dressing is the key inspiration this Pre Autumn Winter 2022, as seen in these Tailored Shorts in Khaki Green. Made from a wool tailoring fabrication, they have a classic fit, frontal patch pocket, to-the-knee length and a hard press down the front for a finish that's structured and smart.

products.title: Tailored Slim-Leg Trouser in Black
products.body_html: This season's approach to tailoring is more relaxed, as seen in these Tailored Slim-Leg Trousers in Black. They have a mid rise and slim fit, with practical front side pockets and a back pocket with buttons. Made in Portugal from a cross hatch fabrication, wear them with the coordinating Three Button Single-Breasted Jacket for a polished, head-to-toe look.

products.title: Knitted Crew-Neck Fitted Jumper in Red Stripe
products.body_html: This season's knitwear is all about texture, colour and fit, as seen in this Knitted Crew-Neck Fitted Jumper in Red Stripe. Made from wool, with a slightly cropped length and striped detail at the shoulder, it's a relaxed yet statement piece that nods to the Pre Autumn Winter collection's sense of structure that never sacrifices comfort or ease.

products.title: Belted Utility Jacket in Khaki Green
products.body_html: This Belted Utility Jacket in Khaki Green offers a new tailoring silhouette this season, with a short, oversized fit that truly feels fresh. Made from a wool tailoring fabrication, it has a hard press down the outer sleeve, a throat latch with silver hardware, flap chest pockets, a belt with sliders, back vent and side seam zips, all details that add to its utilitarian feel.

products.title: Alina High Waisted Patch Pocket Jean in Marble Wash
products.body_html: The Alina Jean in Marble Wash continues to be a key style for VB, with their signature patch pockets, high rise, fit-and-flare shape and leather patch on the back waist. They've been updated for Pre Autumn WInter in Marble Wash, a vintage denim fabrication that nods to the season's utilitarian inspiration.

products.title: Silk Foulard in Navy Ribbon
products.body_html: The navy ribbon print appears throughout the Pre Autumn 2022 collection, including on fluid separates and accessories such as this bold, graphic foulard, which is made in Italy from 100% silk.

products.body_html: Shop the latest Pre-Autumn Winter 2022 Footwear selection.

products.title: Violet Ballerina in Black
products.body_html:
The Violet ballerina has an exaggerated, elongated shape and pointy toe and can be worn as a traditional ballet pump or as a slip-on mule thanks to a collapsible back. Made in Italy from super soft nappa leather in black, they feature a contrasting colour satin lining and a stitched, turned construction that lends softness and malleability. Wear them with everything this season.

specialised dry cleaning only

Fits true to size, take your regular size

products.title: Violet Ballerina in Bordeaux
products.body_html:
Super soft nappa leather in bordeaux gives the Violet ballerina a point of difference, and they're the perfect pairing for everything from denim to dresses. They have an exaggerated, elongated shape and pointy toe and can be worn as a traditional ballet pump or as a mule thanks to a collapsible back. A contrasting satin lining and a stitched, turned construction lend softness and malleability for comfort.

specialised dry cleaning only

Fits true to size, take your regular size

products.title: Eve Flat Sandal in Tan
products.body_html:
A brand new shoe silhouette, the Eve flat sandal features an exaggerated outsole shape with oversized, squared proportions. A fine calf leather upper in classic tan has a thong construction that plays with light, open silhouette, while a side knot detail feels undone and nonchalant.

specialised dry cleaning only

Fits true to size, take your regular size

products.title: Eve Flat Sandal in Bottle Green
products.body_html:

specialised dry cleaning only

products.title: Estelle in Pale Yellow
products.body_html: The Estelle is a new shoe design for VB Footwear, with an almond toe and heel design that features an unexpected, kicked-out inclination. Simple, tubular straps in pale yellow nappa leather, an adjustable back strap, and a knotted toe post detail lend this sandal an open, naked look that plays to the season's light, easy aesthetic.

products.title: Estelle in Bordeaux
products.body_html: With a heel design that features an unexpected, kicked-out inclination, the Estelle is a new shoe design for VB Footwear this season. Simple tubular straps, an adjustable back and a knotted toe post detail lend a naked look that plays to the season's light, open aesthetic. Bordeaux nappa leather and an almond-shaped toe add a sophisticated finish.

products.title: Estelle in Black
products.body_html: VB Footwear this season has a lighter, more open silhouette that reflects the overall mood of the collection, and the Estelle is no exception. With its almond toe and heel that features an unexpected, kicked-out inclination, the Estelle is a simple, sleek sandal with an open, naked look thanks to tubular straps in black nappa leather, an adjustable back strap, and a knotted toe post detail.

products.title: Annie Flat Sandal in Tan
products.body_html: With its exaggerated outsole shape purposely designed with oversized squared proportions, the Annie flat sandal is a new style this season that pairs well with both casual and dressier pieces. A wraparound ankle upper and toe post keep the silhouette light, undone and open, while simple tan calf leather offers a polished finish.

products.title: Annie Flat Sandal in Black
products.body_html: The Annie is a brand new silhouette and features an exaggerated outsole shape that's been purposely designed with oversized squared proportions, while the wraparound ankle upper and toe post keep the silhouette light, nonchalant and open. Made from fine calf leather, the simple black hue makes them the perfect pairing for every ensemble this season.

products.title: Button Detail Skirt in Black
products.body_html: There's a nautical, sailor narrative that runs through the Pre Autumn Winter collection, as seen in this Button Detail Skirt in Black. Made from Merino Wool, it has non-functional pockets and a fastening made up of 11 buttons running up the front centre. Team it with the matching cardigan for a coordinating look.

products.title: Button Detail Cardigan in Black
products.body_html: The Pre Autumn Winter collection was partly inspired by uniform dressing and utilitarian details, as seen in this Button Detail Cardigan in Black. Knitted from Merino Wool, it has a five-button frontal fastening and contrasting VB embroidery on the sleeve. Wear it with the matching skirt for full effect.

products.title: Silk Foulard in Camel Monogram
products.body_html: The new VB monogram print is featured throughout the Pre Autumn 2022 collection, including on fluid separates and accessories such as this bold, graphic foulard, which is made in Italy from 100% silk.

products.title: Reversible Cut Out Bodysuit in Camel Marl
products.body_html: This Reversible Cut Out Bodysuit in Camel Marl can be worn two ways: one way has a small collar and a surprising cut out detail at the back; the other reveals a long slit in the front. Made from merino wool, it is finished with epaulettes that nod to the Pre Autumn Winter 2022 collection's utilitarian, uniform-inspired feel.

products.body_html: The Pre Autumn Winter 2022 collection features pieces with a utilitarian edge, as seen in this Patch Pocket Midi Skirt. Made in the UK from a luxe wool gabardine, it has two large patch pockets with leather binding trim leading into belt loops, as well as an inverted box pleat at the back.

products.title: Poloneck Top in Fluorescent Orange
products.body_html: Acid brights and vibrant hues punctuate the muted palette of the Pre Autumn Winter 2022 collection, as seen in this Poloneck Top in Fluorescent Orange. Made in Portugal from a stretch velvet, it has a back hidden zip and a slim fit that makes it an ideal layering piece for dresses and tialoring alike.

products.title: Poloneck Top in Blue
products.body_html: Worn with denim or under the season's slip dresses, this Poloneck Top in Blue is made in Portugal from a stretch velvet. It has a back hidden zip for a slim fit that nods to the Pre Autumn Winter 2022 collection's uncomplicated sensuality.

products.title: Patch Pocket Pleated Monogram Skirt in Camel-Dark Navy
products.body_html: There's a new monogram print this season, as featured on this Patch Pocket Pleated Skirt. Made in Portugal from a viscose twill fabrication, it has a classic fit with box pleats at the front for fluidity and movement. The back sits flat, and the piece pairs perfectly with the coordinating Pointed Collar Shirt as a sophisticated set for any occasion.

products.title: Pointed Collar Shirt in Black
products.body_html: For Pre Autumn Winter 2022, shirting takes on a more utilitarian feel, as seen in this Pointed Collar Shirt in Black. Made in Portugal from a fluid jersey, it has a curved bottom hemline, a hard press running through the centre back, and leather trim details for a slightly masculine feel. Team with everything from tailoring to a midi skirt for a polished finish.

products.title: Relaxed Utility Shirt in Blue-Rust
products.body_html: This Pre Autumn Winter 2022, utilitarian styling is a key reference, with structured pieces with uniform-inspired details replacing traditional suiting. Case in point: this Relaxed Utility Shirt in Blue-Rust, which has a classic fit, epaulettes with cross stitch details and frontal pockets ‚Äì¬†all in a classic wool check fabrication.

products.title: Pointed Collar Shirt in Camel-Dark Navy
products.body_html: Shirting is a VB signature every season, and for Pre Autumn Winter 2022, it takes on a more utilitarian feel, as seen in this Pointed Collar Shirt in Camel-Dark Navy. Made in Portugal from a viscose twill fabrication, it has a hard-pressed crease and classic menswear-inspired fit; team with loose-fit trousers for an easy, structured look.

Available in a new VB monogram print, it has a front neck tie design, reverse concealed placket, and raglan sleeve that lend a slightly masculine, utilitarian feel. It's made in the UK from a viscose twill fabrication and has a relaxed fit at the bodice that makes it comfortable and easy to wear.

Made in Portugal from a cross-hatch tailoring fabrication, it features an internal corset with powermesh and bra cups, pleat detailing, and a fly fastening at the centre front, with back pockets and a belt with silver hardware for a slight utilitarian feel.

products.title: Sleeveless Poloneck Jumper in Grey
products.body_html: Easy to wear and versatile, this Sleeveless Poloneck Jumper in Grey nods to the season's utilitarian feel, with its slightly oversized, relaxed fit through the shoulders and closer fit at the bodice. Made in Italy from cashmere, it's finished with the signature VB monogram at the centre back neckline.

products.title: Button Detail Skirt in Camel Marl
products.body_html: The Pre Autumn Winter collection features uniform inspired details and nautical touches such as those seen on this Button Detail Skirt in Camel Marl. Made from Merino Wool, it fastens with 11 buttons running up the centre front; pair it with the coordinating cardigan for a polished, head-to-toe look.

products.body_html: This season's approach to coordinated dressing – a VB signature – includes elegant, geometric prints as seen on pieces such as this Pointed Collar Shirt in Khaki Cream. products.body_html: This season's take on coordinated set dressing includes this Patch Pocket Pleated Skirt in Khaki Cream. Made in Portugal from a viscose twill fabrication, it has a classic fit with box pleats at the front for movement and fluidity, while the back sits flat, with no patch pockets. products.body_html: A flattering, jersey dress is a VB brand signature, and this Twin Zip Detail Dress in Black is perhaps this season's most versatile take. Made in Portugal from a fluid jersey fabrication, it has fully functional, double-ended, branded zips running down the front – a nod to the collection's utilitarian inspiration – as well as split sleeve cuffs and a banded crew neck for a cool, covered-up feel.

products.body_html: Set dressing is a VB signature, and this season's version includes prints such as the linear print on this Patch Pocket Pleated Skirt in Navy Multi. Made in Portugal from a silk twill fabrication, it has a classic fit with front box pleats for fluid shape and structure. The back sits flat, with no patch pockets. products.body_html: For Pre Autumn Winter 2022, the Alina Trouser – a VB favourite – is offered in bright red, compact corduroy that's hardwearing and holds you in. A hard pressed crease adds to their structured feel.

products.title: Alina High Waisted Patch Pocket Jean in Faded Blue Wash
products.body_html: With its high waist and slightly relaxed fit through the leg, the Alina Patch Pocket Jean in Faded Blue has an easy feel that will make them an everyday staple. products.body_html:
The Pre Spring Summer 2022 collection has a sense of undone, nonchalant cool, as is evident with pieces such as this Tassel Necklace in Gold. Wear it with one of this season's utilitarian blouses, or layer it over a silk dress as an easy finishing touch.

products.title: VB Pump 115mm in Leopard
products.body_html:
The VB pump is one of the most iconic styles within our footwear collection – and a favourite of VB herself. Updated for Autumn Winter 2021 in leopard print calf hair, they feature a sharp, 115mm stiletto heel and razor-sharp silhouette with signature back detail.

Fits true to size, take your regular size

products.title: VB Pump 115mm in Black
products.body_html:
Versatile and feminine, with a slightly sexy touch: the VB Pump is an icon within our footwear collection and a favourite of the designer herself. This black leather pair has a 115mm stiletto heel, razor-sharp silhouette, and the style's signature, elegant back detail.

Fits true to size, take your regular size

products.title: VB Pump 115mm in Silver Glitter
products.body_html:
The VB pump is built on a classic shape, with a signature back detail and razor-sharp 115mm stiletto heel. Updated for Autumn Winter 2021 in silver glitter fabric, they're the perfect seasonal update on an iconic shoe – wear them with dresses or tailoring for an unexpected, playful finish.

Fits true to size, take your regular size

products.title: Fitted T-shirt Dress in Black
products.body_html: Inspired by the simplicity of a T-shirt, this dress brings a fresh approach to one of the brand's signature fitted shapes. A matte, bonded crepe fabric offers a narrow, flattering fit, while a high neck and midi hemline create an elongated silhouette.

products.title: Rectangular Cat Eye Sunglasses In Tortoise
products.body_html:
Expertly designed, this style is a modern take on a classic cat-eye silhouette. Made from smooth tortoise-effect acetate, it’s universally flattering and versatile. The clean design benefits from subtle attention-to-detail in the form of textured metal detailing along the temples that achieves a guilloché, quilted pattern.

Wipe Clean with Soft, Dry Cloth

products.title: Zip Detail Trouser in Black
products.body_html: Functioning zip details are a key element this Pre Autumn Winter 2022, nodding to the season's utilitarian, uniform inspiration. They appear on these Zip Detail Trousers in Black, which are made in Portugal from a wool gabardine and feature a high rise and slim fit for a leg-elongating look that works for any occasion.

products.title: Twist Shoulder Fit And Flare Dress in Orange
products.body_html: A longline jersey dress is a VB signature, and this Twist Shoulder FIt and Flare Dress in Orange is the perfect example. It features a long, elongated V-neckline and twisted, knotted straps that nods to the Pre Autumn Winter 2022 collection's utilitarian feel, while the panel seam details, cady drape fabrication and side seam pockets offer a sense of easy-to-wear versatility.

products.title: Ruched-neck Blouse in Purple
products.body_html: Considered, versatile, and sensual, the Pre Autumn Winter 2022 collection features romantic blouses that offer a new take on the brand's signature tailored styles. Made in Portugal from a crepe de chine with a soft finish, it has an oversized fit that contrasts the feminine tie-neck detail, ruched back collar and cuffed button fastening. Box pleats at the centre front and gathered pleats on the back panel lend a subtle sense of structure.

products.title: Lace Detail V-Neck Midi Dress in Steel Grey
products.body_html: The Pre Autumn Winter 2022 offers a new take on the slip dress, with a lace appliqué detail offering a subtle, uncomplicated sensuality. Made in the United Kingdom from a cady drape fabrication, this V-Neck Midi Dress has a frill detail and split at the centre back and a hard press detail on the skirt for soft structure.

products.body_html: Uniform dressing is a key inspiration this Pre Autumn Winter 2022, as seen in this reversible, Patch Pocket Belted Coat in Turquoise Olive, which has a checked fabric on the outside. Pockets on both the inner and outer, classic tortoiseshell buttons, and side vents offer a utilitarian touch, while contrast red binding is a signature VB finish.

products.title: Straight Leg Trouser in Off White
products.body_html: These Straight Leg Trousers are a versatile piece from the Pre Autumn Winter 2022 collection that works well with casual separates and blouses alike. Made in Portugal from a cady drape fabrication, they have a straight fit and are finished with front side pockets and back pockets that are both easy and practical.

products.title: Key Charm Necklace in Gold
products.body_html: The Key Charm necklace makes for a playful accessory this season; expertly crafted in Italy from gold brushed brass. Style with our signature cami evening dresses or to elevate everyday tailoring and T-shirts.

products.title: Key Charm Anklet in Gold
products.body_html: The Key Charm Anklet makes for a playful accessory this season. Crafted with a gold-plated finish, and adjustable clasp, this piece can be styled as a bracelet, or mix-and-matched as an anklet accessory; with and without the removable key charm.

products.title: Destiny Sandal 90mm in Green
products.body_html: Coming soon: the latest Pre-Autumn Winter 2022 Footwear selection.

products.title: Victoria Mid-Rise Jean in Miami Wash
products.body_html: The Victoria Jean has a mid rise and slightly cropped length that feels modern and versatile. Made in Italy from a structured, washed denim fabrication, they have a leather patch on the back waist and a classic button fly.

products.title: Mia Wide Leg Mid Rise Jean in Miami Wash
products.body_html: The Pre Autumn Winter 2022 collection sees the launch of the new Mia Jean, a wide-leg style with a boyfriend fit, mid rise and lower slung waist. Made in Italy from a structured denim fabrication, they're meant to be worn long, with a leather branding patch at the waist and a branded shank and rivets to finish the look.

products.title: Utility Detail Dress in Steel Grey
products.body_html: A utilitarian sensibility replaces more traditional tailoring this season, with structured details such as pocket flaps juxtaposed against a cady drape fabrication for a look that's uncomplicated yet considered. Made in Portugal, this style is fitted at the hip and waist, with a slightly oversized top and draped bodice at the side seam. A centre front split allows for easy movement, while a deep neckline slit lends a sensual finish.

products.title: Zip Detail Utility Dress in Black
products.body_html:
Description

The Pre Autumn Winter 2022 collection has a distinct utilitarian vibe, as seen in this Zip Detail Utility Dress in Black. FItted at the hip and relaxed through the bodice, it features zips on the chest and skirt, with double ended zips and branded zipper pulls, silver cuff snaps, side seam pockets, epaulettes and waist tabs. It's finished with pleats on the back bodice.

products.body_html: The Pre Autumn Winter collection has a distinct utilitarian feel, with vintage uniform references and details such as zips, pockets and drawstrings. Channel the look in this Front Pocket Hoodie in Ecru-Navy, which is made in Portugal from a ribbed Breton fabrication.

products.title: Drawstring Shorts in Ecru
products.body_html: One of the key relaxed sets in the Pre Autumn Winter 2022 collection, these Drawstring Shorts in Ecru have a relaxed, utilitarian feel, with contrast detailing and a VB logo for added interest. Wear them with the matching Cropped Hoodie for a fuss-free, head-to-toe look.

products.title: Cropped Hoodie in Ecru
products.body_html:
The Pre Autumn Winter collection has a relaxed, utilitarian feel, with vintage uniform references and a muted palette inspired by interior design. This Cropped Hoodie in Ecru has contrast detailing and a VB logo; wear this versatile piece with the matching shorts for an easy, head-to-toe look.

machine wash, iron one dot, iron on reverse of garment

products.title: Poloneck Bodysuit in Bordeaux
products.body_html: This Poloneck Bodysuit in Bordeaux nods to the figure-hugging aesthetic of the Pre Autumn Winter 2022 collection. Made from merino wool, it's a versatile, easy-to-wear piece for any occasion whether you pair it with tailoring or denim.

products.title: Poloneck Bodysuit in Emerald Green
products.body_html: The pared-back palette of the Pre Autumn Winter 2022 collection is punctuated by vibrant brights such as the Jungle shade of this Poloneck Bodysuit. Made from merino wool, it's a versatile, figure-hugging piece that's easy to wear both on its own or as a layering piece with the season's knitwear and tailoring.

products.title: Poloneck Bodysuit in Grey Marl
products.body_html: The floatiness of past seasons has disappeared, and the Pre Autumn Winter 2022 collection is a celebration of figure-hugging silhouettes such as this Poloneck Bodysuit in Grey Marl. Versatile and easy to wear, it's made from merino wool and works well as either a layer or stylish piece on its own.

products.title: Poloneck Bodysuit in Cream
products.body_html: The Pre Autumn Winter 2022 collection is a celebration of figure-hugging silhouettes, with pieces such as this Poloneck Bodysuit in Cream offering a close fit that counteracts the floatiness of previous seasons. Made from merino wool, it's a versatile, easy-to-wear style that works well on its own or as a layer under tailoring or knitwear.

products.title: Poloneck Bodysuit in Black
products.body_html: Made from merino wool, this Poloneck Bodysuit in Black is a versatile, easy-to-wear style that works well on its own with denim or a skirt or as a layering piece with tailoring. It's an example of the figure-hugging silhouettes that are key to the Pre Autumn Winter 2022 collection and offer a welcome juxtaposition to the floatiness of seasons past.

products.title: Amelia Leather Mule in Black
products.body_html: The Amelia Mule makes a debut as a new footwear style for Pre-Autumn winter 2022. An outdoor style slip-on shoe, both versatile and chic. This style is completed with a brushed hair-calf fabrication.

products.title: Amelia Leather Mule in Burgundy
products.body_html: The Amelia Mule makes a debut as a new footwear style for Pre-Autumn winter 2022. An outdoor style slip-on shoe, both versatile and chic. This style is completed with in a finely embossed leather fabrication.

products.title: Amelia Leather Mule in White
products.body_html: The Amelia Mule makes a debut as a new footwear style for Pre-Autumn winter 2022. An outdoor style slip-on shoe, both versatile and chic. This style is completed with in a finely embossed leather fabrication.

products.title: Twist Front Dress in Black
products.body_html: This Twist Front Dress in Black has a fit and flare shape and fluid jersey fabrication that make it an easy piece for any occasion. With a twist front at the waist and collar, a slit detail at the neckline and two cut outs at the waist, this style is both sensual and versatile. Slit details at the long sleeve cuffs and a raw, long-midi hem offer a cool, undone finish.

products.title: Corduroy Alina Trouser in Moss Green
products.body_html: Offered this season in moss green corduroy, the Alina Trouser is a VB favourite thanks to its fit and flare shape and flattering, high rise. Made in Portugal from a corduroy that's compact, hardwearing and holds you in, they're finished with hard-pressed creases and front and back patch pockets, with top stitching that includes the VB embroidery at the front.

products.title: Corduroy Alina Trouser in Lilac
products.body_html: A VB favourite, the Alina Trouser is offered for Pre Autumn Winter in compact, lilac corduroy that's hardwearing and holds you in. Made in Portugal and featuring the silhouette's signature high rise and fit and flare shape, they're finished with patch pockets at the front and back, with top stitching at the front that includes the VB embroidery. A hard pressed crease down the front and back add to their structured feel.

products.title: Single Pleat Trouser in Steel Grey
products.body_html: This season's take on tuxedo dressing is a lace-trimmed shirt with cut out and tailored trousers such as these Single Pleat Trousers in Steel Grey. Made in Portugal from a cady drape fabrication, they have a front pleat, front pockets, and two buttoned back pockets for a silhouette that's structured yet uncomplicated.

products.title: Pleated Long Sleeve Top in Vanilla
products.body_html: This season's take on the signature VB romantic blouse is this Pleated Long Sleeve Top in Vanilla, which is made in Portugal from a soft crepe de chine and features an oversized fit, with pleats down the front, as well as on the front and back of the raglan shoulder. It's finished with a chain trim at the collar with gold hardware, a side split detail, and a straight hemline.

products.title: Twist Shoulder Top in Black
products.body_html: Twist and knot details are a key feature in the Pre Autumn Winter 2022 collection, and this Twist Shoulder Top in Black is a versatile, uncomplicated piece that pairs well with the season's vibrant separates. Made from a soft, crepe back satin, it has shoulder strap detailing, a V-neckline at the front and back, side split and and an easy, flared fit.

products.title: Ruched-neck Ruffle Blouse in Vanilla
products.body_html: This Ruched-neck Ruffle Blouse in Vanilla is a romantic piece that offers a new take on the brand's signature tailoring. Made in Portugal from a crepe de chine with a soft finish, it has an oversized fit juxtaposed by a feminine tie-neck detail, ruched back collar and cuffed button fastening. Front box pleats and gathered pleats on the back panel lend soft structure that means this piece pairs well with relaxed-fit trousers.

products.title: Pointed Collar Shirt in Navy-Multi
products.body_html: Set dressing is a VB signature, and this season's version includes prints such as the linear print on this Pointed Collar Shirt in Navy Multi. Made in Portugal from a silk twill fabrication, it has a hard-pressed crease and classic menswear-inspired fit for a structured yet uncomplicated look.

products.title: Lace Detail Blouse in Black
products.body_html: Lace is a common feature in VB collections, and this season, it makes an appearance on pieces such as this Lace Detail Blouse in Black. Made in Portugal from a crepe de chine with a soft finish, it has a tie neck, ruched back colllar with binded design and buttoned cuffs. A box pleat design at the centre front and gathered pleats on the back panel add an elegant touch.

products.title: Zip Detail Utility Dress in Off-White
products.body_html: This season's collection has a distinctively utilitarian vibe, as seen in this Zip Detail Utility Dress in Off-White. Fitted at the hip and relaxed through the bodice, this piece has zips on the chest and skirt, with double ended zips and branded zipper pulls that complement the uniform-inspired silver cuff snaps, side seam pockets, epaulettes and waist tabs. Pleats on the back bodice and contrast topstitching‚ khaki on the waistband, red on the side seams adding a unique finishing touch.

products.body_html: Versatility is a keyword this season, and this Long Sleeve Pleated Shirt Dress speaks to this perfectly. Made in the UK from a lurex stripe fabrication, it has a front necktie design and a split in the side seams for ease of movement, while a reverse concealed placket and raglan sleeve nod subtly to the season's utilitarian inspiration. Wear it belted or over a polo top for a chic, covered-up look.

products.title: Bib Detail Shirt Dress in Ecru
products.body_html: Utilitarian details replace more traditional tailoring in the Pre Autumn Winter 2022 collection, and details such as the bib detail on this Shirt Dress in Ecru nod to the season's more relaxed approach. Made in Italy from a chambray canvas fabrication, the dress has a relaxed fit, with a front button fastening and self belt for just a touch of structure.

products.title: Twist Front Dress in Apple Green
products.body_html: Bright, punchy hues such as the Apple Green of this Twist Front Dress punctuate the pared-back, mostly utilitarian palette of the Pre Autumn Winter 2022 collection. Made in Portugal from a fluid jersey fabric, the dress has a twist front at the waist and collar, with a slit detail at the neckline and two cut outs at the waist for a touch of sensuality. Slit details at the cuffs and a raw hem offer a cool finish.

products.title: Pleated Long Sleeve Top in Purple
products.body_html: Elegant pleat details are a VB signature, and this season, they appear on pieces such as this Pleated Long Sleeve Top in Purple. Made in Portugal from a soft crepe de chine, it has an oversized fit, with pleats down the front, as well as on the front and back of the raglan shoulder. A side split, straight hemline, and chain trim at the collar with gold hardware are a soft finishing touch.

products.title: Wrap Midi Dress in Khaki-Cream
products.body_html: A flattering, jersey dress that offers fluidity and sensuality is a VB signature, as seen in this season's Wrap Midi Dress. Made in Portugal from a viscose twill fabrication, it has a wrap front with belt, bib detail on the bodice, and gold chain hardware on the sleeves for a feminine finishing touch.

products.title: Trompette Slim-Leg Trouser in Orange
products.body_html: This season's interpretation of the classic VVB ponte set includes these Trompette Slim-Leg Trousers in Orange, which have a high rise, front pockets and a front fly for a slim fit. Wear them with a vest top for an easy everyday look, or with the corresponding Short Sleeve Fitted Shirt for a more polished, head-to-toe effect.
